docs.lead_paragraph: An Italian official says that the autopsy on the chief suspect in the Berlin Christmas market attack indicated frequent drug use.

docs.lead_paragraph: With most of her teammates in foul trouble, Marina Mabrey took over to get Notre Dame back to the ACC Tournament finals.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Washington state man has been sentenced to 20 years in prison for killing an Oregon man he mistakenly believed impregnated a 13-year-old girl.

docs.lead_paragraph: The International Monetary Fund said on Saturday it had reached an agreement with Ukraine on an updated memorandum under a $17.5 billion program, paving the way for its board to consider the disbursement of the fourth loan tranche later in March.

headline.main: IMF Reaches Deal With Ukraine Paving Way for Next Loan Disbursal
headline.print_headline: IMF Reaches Deal With Ukraine Paving Way for Next Loan Disbursal

docs.snippet: The International Monetary Fund said on Saturday it had reached an agreement with Ukraine on an updated memorandum under a $17.5 billion program, paving the way for its board to consider the disbursement of the fourth loan tranche later in March....

docs.lead_paragraph: Virginia coach Tony Bennett waited after No. 23 Virginia's 67-42 victory against Pittsburgh was over, and then waited again until London Perrantes had finished a postgame television interview before putting his arm around the point guard and walking off the court.

headline.main: Perrantes Leads No. 23 Virginia Past Pitt, 67-42
headline.print_headline: Perrantes Leads No. 23 Virginia Past Pitt, 67-42

docs.lead_paragraph: The White House budget director confirmed Saturday that the Trump administration will propose "fairly dramatic reductions" in the U.S. foreign aid budget later this month.

docs.lead_paragraph: A recently unsealed search warrant shows police have suspects in the fatal shooting of a 9-year-old Milwaukee girl last year, but authorities are still seeking evidence to bring charges in her death.

headline.print_headline: Warrant Shows Police Have Suspects in Death of 9-Year-Old

docs.lead_paragraph: Poland named a center-right MEP as its candidate for European Council President on Saturday after it said it would oppose the re-appointment of former prime minister Donald Tusk as the chairman of EU leaders.

headline.print_headline: Poland Wants Center-Right MEP to Replace Tusk as European Council Head

docs.lead_paragraph: Standard Life and Aberdeen Asset Management, two of Scotland's most well-known financial firms, are in talks over an 11 billion pound ($13.5 billion) tie-up to create Britain's largest investment manager.
